_meta.source: Researched from Kauai visitor bureau, Hawaii tourism, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Nawiliwili, Waimea Canyon, and Na Pali Coast area

label_overrides.waimea-canyon: Waimea Canyon (Grand Canyon of the Pacific)

transit_routes.name: Drive to Waimea Canyon
transit_routes.note: Rental car or ship excursion. Scenic drive with multiple lookouts. Allow full day.

transit_routes.name: Na Pali Coast Boat Tour
transit_routes.note: Depart from west side. Helicopter tours also available. Weather dependent.

featured_experiences.name: Waimea Canyon
featured_experiences.note: Called the Grand Canyon of the Pacific. Multiple viewpoints along drive. Continue to Kokee for more views.

featured_experiences.name: Na Pali Coast
featured_experiences.note: Kauai's most iconic scenery. Boat tours include snorkeling. Some cruise ships sail past.

featured_experiences.name: Poipu Beach
featured_experiences.note: Kauai's sunniest beach area. 30-minute drive from port. Great for families.
